New Records: Nikola Jokic scored 46 points and 10 rebounds, setting a new high for the Nuggets in the game.
Victor Wembanyama achieved his 57th career double-double with 20 points and 23 rebounds.
Key Match Events: Jokic scored nine points in overtime to secure the win.
Zach Collins and Russell Westbrook each received a technical foul after taunting each other.
Post-Match Reflections: Nikola Jokic praised Victor Wembanyama, calling him 'one of a kind' and believing he will be'remembered forever' in the league.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets' bench contributed 18 points and 21 rebounds.
Victor Wembanyama is averaging 30.6 points and 11.7 rebounds in his last nine games.
Others: The game was significant for Victor Wembanyama's 21st birthday.
